comments:
Eclipse 200406251208  CDT 200406301134  JRE J9

Steps
1) Create a managed project "MgdCpp"
2) Create a main.cpp function and put the following in it:

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int 
main(int argc, char **argv) {
	
}

3) Go to the Class Browser Perspective
4) Click on the Managed Project in 1) 
5) Click on std in Namespaces
6) Click on __codecvt_abstract_base in Types
7) Click on always_noconv():bool
